comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: I lost the IDO tap fantasy metaverse moment, the sale was very short, only 32 minutes to collect 80k ton, I hope to have the opportunity in the next IDO, hopefully it will be available in the near future

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on November 17, 2023, 09:53:16 PMI lost the IDO tap fantasy metaverse moment, the sale was very short, only 32 minutes to collect 80k ton, I hope to have the opportunity in the next IDO, hopefully it will be available in the near futureThe bounty campaign still has some advantages for you, but the budget is low for those with an interest in big investments. It is possible that the price will drop a little before it returns, so you can make a purchase when it gets on exchange. Having such a big partner like Microcosm Lab will certainly make a difference.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: The tokenomics are impressive and have a lot of potential. I haven't seen one for a long time. All you have to do is pick up early, maybe using a variety of prices, and hold for the next 12 months. The ROI on such investment are very huge. In general I don't advise investing money directly in a project, but this will give a good return. This is not a financial advice just my opinion according to the metrics because anything can happen in crypto, but at the moment the project is doing well.

comments.author: Altcoiner007
comments.body: I'm excited about the Successful listing of $UP on Bitget LaunchPad stage on Bitget LaunchPad. I think congratulations are in order to all investors. I'm glad the learn to earn quiz is giving extra opportunity for TonUP enthusiasts to accumulate $UP or simply buy up now that's listed for trading activities

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Altcoiner007 on December 22, 2023, 07:47:15 PMI'm excited about the Successful listing of $UP on Bitget LaunchPad stage on Bitget LaunchPad. I think congratulations are in order to all investors. I'm glad the learn to earn quiz is giving extra opportunity for TonUP enthusiasts to accumulate $UP or simply buy up now that's listed for trading activitiesNice success. Price has risen to $0.85 from $0.10. This is already a huge pump. investors must haave been selling already while the price shot to 8x. as much as i wanted to rise the pump in this token, it feels like i'm already giving away all my data all over again if another exchange will be asking my KYC documents. And it's tiresome already to keep signing up and submitting them. are you guys trusting bitget?Telegram, though has its wallet which if this UP token is automatically added to the exchanges in Telegram or the swap in Tonkeeper, the better. Just trading it there is more convenient, nothing will be asked since telegram only requires phone numbers.
